attributes.action: justice for mothers and babies who suffered at the hands of Queens maternity unit Romford
attributes.additional_details: guidelines and procedures being changed or dramatically improved in order to prevent the ill care being received at Queens hospital Maternity unit Romford Essex, I would like government to address this matter with a public inquiry as to why many patients and babies are suffering and dying at the hands of a high risk unit. Would also like to address cuts being made in health service that are contributing to this.
